sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SCHOENUS, in botany: A genus of the monogynia order, belonging to the triandria claſs of plants; and in the natural method ranking under the 3d order,
Calamarioe. The glumes are paleaceous, univalved, and thickſet; there is no corolla, and only one roundiſh feed between the glumes.
